title: Welcome to My Blog
content:
Hello, I'm Sahil Deo, and this is my full-stack development journey!
I decided to start this blog to document my progress, share my experiences with various technologies, and keep track of my weight loss journey. As a full-stack developer, I specialize in React, Node.js, cloud technologies, and AI. I hope to inspire others by showing both my professional growth and personal challenges.

In this blog, you’ll find a mix of tutorials, project showcases, and personal reflections. Feel free to explore, and I’m always open to feedback and discussions!

Stay tuned for more posts, and thank you for visiting
